### IPromptPlusConfig.CompletionWaitToStart property
</br>


#### Number of milliseconds to wait before to start function autocomplete. Default value is 500 Valid range is &gt; 100; values outside the range are coerced to the nearest boundary.

```csharp
public int CompletionWaitToStart { get; set; }
```
